content:
This issue was brought up for estimation at sprint planning just now but I don't have a good guess about how much work it is: #11553

Also, while the title is currently "New non-Docker installations still use deprecated BlockedApi* database settings" it looks like a deprecated setting is used here:

modules/container-configbaker/scripts/bootstrap/demo/init.sh

47:curl -sS -X PUT -d 'admin,builtin-users' "${DATAVERSE_URL}/api/admin/settings/:BlockedApiEndpoints"

I put this on the agenda for next time: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mCgLpIP00BkDr1VFtD-2OgDSmi3We2BGpgiKYrZbRpM/edit?usp=sharing
